Blackfang: I just hope it's not too deep then... I'll try 
something. How much time passed on this planet since Primal and his 
group were here for a stasis pod to be this deep? Blackfang, maximize!

He transformed to robot mode, reached for something in his back with 
both hands and produced a large halberd and a mean-looking shotgun. He 
aimed the ground with the shotgun and fired an energy blast. It made a 
hole in the rocky ground.

Blackfang: This may actually work. If we blast our way deep enough, I 
can then dig with my halberd when we get close to the pod... What do 
you think? Is it too risky?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He looks around. He walks to the exact spot of the signal.
> 
> "I dont see anything. No pod, no nothing. However the signal is 
coming from here. It must be underground."
> 
> OOC: Thanks for the info.
